subject: AI & Agents
title: API Design for ML Services
description: A fast breakdown of API Design for ML Services for builders.

hook.text: Your model returns a float. Your API should return a decision with confidence and metadata.

buildup.text: Wrap models in REST or gRPC APIs with clear input schemas, output schemas, and error codes.

discovery.text: Include: prediction, confidence score, model version, and latency in every response.

twist.text: Versioning matters: /v1/predict and /v2/predict can run different models simultaneously.

climax.text: Tools: FastAPI + Uvicorn for REST, Triton for high-performance GPU serving.

punchline.text: The model is the brain. The API is the interface.

quiz.question: What should an ML API response include besides the prediction?
options: Confidence score, model version, and latency
